text: ONE DAY, YOU WILL PAY WITH YOUR SOUL.
NAGASH ACCEPTS ONLY OUT OF PITY.
KNEEL AS NAGASH DEIGNS APPROACH YOU.
EVEN THE LOWEST MAY BE USEFUL TO THE LORD OF UNDEATH.
REVEL AS YOU ARE GRACED WITH NAGASH'S PRESENCE.
YOUR CORPSE WOULD BE MORE USEFUL TO THE GREAT NECROMANCER
PAY TRIBUTE TO THE LORD OF DEATH.
NAGASH GRACES YOU WITH HIS PRESENCE
DO NOT TEST THE NECROCRAT'S PATIENCE.
GAZE ON THE GREAT NECROMANCER'S MAGNIFICENCE.
AS IF YOU HAD A CHOICE.
YOUR CORPSE WILL SERVE US SOON.
YOU WILL NOT LIVE LONG ENOUGH TO REGRET THIS.
MAGGOTS HAVE MORE SENSE THAN YOU, PITIFUL WORM.
DEATH COMES FOR ALL. FOR YOU IT WILL BE EARLY.
YOU ARE NOT WORTHY OF NAGASH.
YOUR PITIFUL SCHEMES AMUSE US NO MORE.
REMOVE THIS NUISANCE FROM OUR SIGHT.
NAGASH SPEAKS. GROVEL AT OUR FEET.
BE GRATEFUL AS THE GREAT NECROMANCER ACKNOWLEDGES YOUR MISERABLE EXISTENCE.
SERVE IN LIFE, OR IN DEATH, IT MATTERS NOT TO NAGASH.
I DID NOT EXTINGUISH YOU. BE OF USE AS REPAYMENT FOR OUR MERCY.
REJOICE AS THE LORD OF UNDEATH ASKS FOR YOUR... ASSISTANCE.
NAGASH WILL ALLOW YOU TO RETREAT.
NAGASH WOULD CRUSH YOU, BUT WE HAVE USE FOR YOU YET.
GET RID OF THIS FOR US, SLAVE.
YOU HAVE MORE VALUE ALIVE, BUT A CORPSE WILL SERVE NAGASH JUST AS WELL.
YOUR PATHETIC ATTEMPT RAISES ONLY CONTEMPT.
NAGASH DOES NOT PARLEY WITH WORMS.
DISRESPECT NAGASH AT YOUR OWN PERIL.
YOU WILL SERVE NAGASH IN THE END.
NAGASH'S SPIT HAS MORE AUTHORITY THAN YOU, EVEN THOUGH IT HAS DRIED OUT AGES AGO.
THE END HAS COME FOR YOU.
